GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18.4 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
amt: fix possible null-ptr-deref in amt_rcv()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 55bbdc2d41a8b32ef0ef63ffd0c291e56f804df6, it was introduced in version v5.18.4 by commit 4b8032d39b276c52db57ff834c300405b9da2691. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: amt: fix possible null-ptr-deref in amt_rcv()
